title: Junglepool
body:
I want junglers with cc, good ganks, doesnt fall pf 2 much late.
Pref point n click spells instead of skillshots.

replies.body:
{{champion:11}} {{champion:19}} 

Best 450 you could ever spend. Both are outstanding late-game.
While Yi is a good choice, he is not the kind that the OP would want (no CC)

I've been playing a lot of Xin Zhao recently, and I really think he fits the ticket quite nicely.  Three talon strike is on a very short cooldown and provides a knock-up plus extra damage.  He starts really strong and scales fairly well into the late game.  Also, not a single skillshot on that champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Shiroi Kitsune,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=ytK3slkK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T06:18:11.164+0000)
>
> I've been playing a lot of Xin Zhao recently, and I really think he fits the ticket quite nicely.  Three talon strike is on a very short cooldown and provides a knock-up plus extra damage.  He starts really strong and scales fairly well into the late game.  Also, not a single skillshot on that champ.

I'm going to second his suggestion here, Xin is a great pick for what you want Lats.  Feel free to glance at my rune pages/masteries for an example setup (it's the pages titled siksiksik).

Another great option is Maokai.  He has a point and click snare, and once they are snare you aren't going to miss Q or E for follow up CC.  He won't do the damage that someone like reksai will but with the advent of cinderhulk he can clear, gank, and tank.

{{champion:254}} {{champion:113}}  both are strong.
vi basically instagibs the adc no matter what if her ult is up.
see u an I is extremely noob friendly, build full tank and you have stupid CC and a good bit of damage because of % hp.

{{champion:5}} {{champion:54}}  and my all time fav {{champion:19}} 
just play champs with hard cc or lockdown abilities, if u go in for a gank post-6 u get a kill
Jarvan, though he does have one and a half skillshots, is probably one of the best Junglers to learn.

{{champion:106}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:57}} are some good tanks that (generally) fit your criteria (Maokai has a few skillshots, but they aren't too difficult to land, especially since Twisted Advance is targeted). Beware of players building QSS/Mikael's as Rammus though.
